device-model.name: ARC-960SB
device-model.comments: Tested device S/N: M6707126 - Note: This device is a fuzzy logic rice cooker, it is highly dependant on operational conditions, see state notes.

state.name: SoftOff
state.comments: Soft of state, lowest operational state when device is plugged in.

state.name: Active-HeatingCycleOneCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of cook at 212F, 14 min in length

state.name: Active-PreHeatingCycleOneCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of hold Keep Warm), 14 min in length, period to reach boiling for cooking to start, tested with 1 cup rice, 1.5 cups water

state.name: Active-CookingCycleOneCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle total of 32 minutes and 30 seconds from cycle start, 13:30 from end of preheat cycle, tested with 1 cup rice, 1.5 cups water

state.name: Active-KeepWarm
state.comments: Extended cycle from end of cooking phase to continual keep warm phase, this was measured over a 3 hour period.

state.name: Active-Standby
state.comments: Post cycle operatrion, likely similar state to SoftOff, this state is active for 30 seconds post mode selection before a cooking cycle starts.

state.name: Active-Steam
state.comments: Steam cook cycle, tested with no food. Using reccommened water load of 1.5 cups of water, ends with initiation of Off, not warm. Tested with no food load. 33 min, 30 seconds length for heatup and cook, hold at 212F for period after a 30 second startup delay before applyication of heat after selecting option.

state.name: Active-HeatingCycleTwoCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of cook at 212F, 21 min in length

state.name: Active-PreHeatingCycleTwoCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of hold Keep Warm), 14 min in length, period to reach boiling for cooking to start, tested with 2 cups rice, 3 cups water

state.name: Active-CookingCycleOneTwoWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle total of 36 minutes and 30 seconds from cycle start, 17:30 from end of preheat cycle, tested with 2 cups rice, 3 cups water

state.name: Active-HeatingCycleThreeCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of cook at 212F, 21 min in length- same equiv. as 2 cup power use, different timing

state.name: Active-PreHeatingCycleThreeCupWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle from heatup to start of hold Keep Warm), 19 min in length, period to reach boiling for cooking to start, tested with 3 cups rice, 4.5 cups water - same equiv. as 2 cup power use, different timing

state.name: Active-CookingCycleOneThreeWhiteRice
state.comments: Single cycle total of 40 minutes and 30 seconds from cycle start, 20:30 from end of preheat cycle, tested with 3 cups rice, 4.5 cups water- same equiv. as 2 cup power use, different timing

state.name: HardOff
state.comments: Plugged in only, not turned on, hard power switch in off position

state.name: SoftOff
state.comments: Plugged in, hard power switch in on position, soft power switch off(no LED indicator on)

state.name: Sleep
state.comments: Plugged in, hard power switch in on position, soft power switch ON, in power save mode

state.name: Active-ImageDisplayed
state.comments: Plugged in, hard power switch in on position, soft power switch ON, in power save mode

state.name: SoftOff
state.comments: Monitor with power button pressed and no lights. In Soft Off State.

state.name: Active-EnteringStandby
state.comments: Aprox. 5 second transient state when entering standby.

state.name: Active-Standby
state.comments: Monitor with amber standby light on.

state.name: Active-DesktopImage
state.comments: Monitor with multiple content bright and dark. Little difference in power use based on visual content.

state.name: Active-Idle
state.comments: Drive in active operation but with no requests to it over a period of 10 minutes.

state.name: Active-HeavyTransfer
state.comments: Active heavy file transfer active.

state.name: Active-PowerSave
state.comments: Active drive in sleep mode.
